description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国官员，曾任中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室主任、国务院侨务办公室副主任（正部长级）。
description.en: An official of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, formerly served as the Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Macao Special Administrative Region and the Deputy Director of the Overseas Chinese Affairs Office of the State Council (ministerial level).

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省下辖的县级市，是李刚的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Li Gang.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省大连市的一所公立大学。李刚曾在此学习和任教。
description.en: A public university in Dalian, Liaoning, China. Li Gang studied and taught here.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的中央领导机构。李刚曾在此长期任职。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Youth League of China. Li Gang held long-term positions here.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的中国基本人民团体之一。李刚曾在此担任职务。
description.en: One of the basic people's organizations in China under the leadership of the Communist Party of China. Li Gang held positions here.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国文化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责文化事务的组成部门。李刚曾在此任职。
description.en: Formerly a component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for cultural affairs. Li Gang served here.

en: Embassy of the People's Republic of China in the United States of America

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在美国设立的外交代表机构。李刚曾在此担任文化参赞。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the People's Republic of China in the United States. Li Gang served as a cultural counselor here.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的直属机构，与国务院新闻办公室一个机构两块牌子。李刚曾任副主任。
description.en: A direct agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, which operates with the State Council Information Office under a 'one institution, two names' model. Li Gang served as its Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的办事机构，与中央对外宣传办公室一个机构两块牌子。李刚曾任副主任。
description.en: An administrative office of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which operates with the Central Office for Foreign Propaganda under a 'one institution, two names' model. Li Gang served as its Deputy Director.

en: China Society for Human Rights Studies

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性学术团体。李刚曾任副会长。
description.en: A national academic organization in China. Li Gang served as its Vice President.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室

zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室
en: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区的代表机构。李刚曾任副主任。
description.en: The representative office of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region. Li Gang served as its Deputy Director.

description.zh-cn: 指香港政府于2009年至2010年间，根据《香港基本法》及全国人大常委会的决定，在香港推动的政治制度改革。
description.en: Refers to the political system reform promoted by the Hong Kong government between 2009 and 2010, in accordance with the Hong Kong Basic Law and decisions of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室

zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室
en: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Macao Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区的代表机构。李刚曾任副主任及主任。
description.en: The representative office of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China in the Macao Special Administrative Region. Li Gang served as its Deputy Director and Director.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

en: Overseas Chinese Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管侨务工作的机构。李刚曾任副主任。
description.en: Formerly an agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of overseas Chinese affairs. Li Gang served as its Deputy Director.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会
en: 17th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七次全国代表大会选举产生的中央纪律检查委员会。李刚是其委员之一。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection elected by the 17th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. Li Gang was one of its members.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会
en: 18th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会选举产生的中央纪律检查委员会。李刚是其委员之一。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection elected by the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. Li Gang was one of its members.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十二届国家最高权力机关。李刚是其代表之一。
description.en: The twelfth term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China. Li Gang was one of its deputies.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 12th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 12th National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会第八次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会第八次全体会议
en: Eighth Plenary Session of the 18th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 审议并通过了关于李刚、曲淑辉严重违纪问题的审查报告的会议。
description.en: A meeting that reviewed and passed the examination report on the serious disciplinary violations of Li Gang and Qu Shuhui.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国官员，与李刚一同在中共十八届中央纪委第八次全会上被通报严重违纪问题。
description.en: An official of the People's Republic of China, who was reported for serious disciplinary violations along with Li Gang at the Eighth Plenary Session of the 18th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 李刚之妻，曾任中国人民解放军艺术学院舞蹈系主任，中国舞蹈家协会副主席。
description.en: Wife of Li Gang, former director of the Dance Department of the PLA Academy of Arts, and Vice Chairman of the China Dancers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，李刚在中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室主任职位上的前任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, and Li Gang's predecessor as Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Macao Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，李刚在中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室主任职位上的继任者。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, and Li Gang's successor as Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Macao Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 中国对外文化交流协会

zh-cn: 中国对外文化交流协会

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性对外文化交流社会团体。李刚曾任秘书长。
description.en: A national social organization for international cultural exchange in China. Li Gang served as its Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李刚是山东莱阳人。
description.en: Li Gang is a native of Laiyang, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 1970年至1974年，为辽宁外语专科学校（大连外国语大学前身）英语系学生。
description.en: From 1970 to 1974, he was a student in the English Department of Liaoning Foreign Languages Vocational School (predecessor of Dalian University of Foreign Languages).

position.en: English Teacher, Youth League Committee Secretary

description.zh-cn: 1974年至1978年，任辽宁外语专科学校英语教师、团委书记。
description.en: From 1974 to 1978, he served as an English teacher and Secretary of the Youth League Committee at Liaoning Foreign Languages Vocational School.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

position.zh-cn: 国际联络部翻译、副处长、处长、副部长、部长，团中央常委
position.en: Translator, Deputy Division Chief, Division Chief, Deputy Minister, Minister of the International Liaison Department; Standing Committee Member of the CYL Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 1978年至1993年，在共青团中央国际联络部历任翻译、副处长、处长、副部长、部长，并担任共青团中央常委。
description.en: From 1978 to 1993, he served successively as translator, deputy division chief, division chief, deputy minister, and minister of the International Liaison Department of the CYL Central Committee, and was a member of the Standing Committee of the CYL Central Committee.

position.zh-cn: 国际部副部长、常委、副秘书长
position.en: Deputy Minister of the International Department, Standing Committee Member, Deputy Secretary-General

description.zh-cn: 1978年至1993年间，曾任全国青联国际部副部长、常委、副秘书长。
description.en: Between 1978 and 1993, he served as Deputy Minister of the International Department, Standing Committee Member, and Deputy Secretary-General of the All-China Youth Federation.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国文化部

position.zh-cn: 对外文化联络局副局长、局长，港澳台文化事务司司长
position.en: Deputy Director-General and Director-General of the Bureau for External Cultural Relations, Director-General of the Department of Culture of Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan Affairs

description.zh-cn: 1993年至1994年任文化部对外文化联络局副局长。1998年至2001年，任文化部对外文化联络局局长、港澳台文化事务司司长。
description.en: From 1993 to 1994, he served as Deputy Director-General of the Bureau for External Cultural Relations of the Ministry of Culture. From 1998 to 2001, he served as Director-General of the Bureau for External Cultural Relations and Director-General of the Department of Culture of Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan Affairs of the Ministry of Culture.

description.zh-cn: 1994年至1998年，任中国驻美国大使馆正局级公使衔文化参赞。
description.en: From 1994 to 1998, he served as Minister-Counselor for Cultural Affairs (Director-General level) at the Chinese Embassy in the United States.

relationships.target: 中国对外文化交流协会

description.zh-cn: 1998年至2001年，任中国对外文化交流协会秘书长。
description.en: From 1998 to 2001, he served as Secretary-General of the China International Cultural Exchange Association.

description.zh-cn: 2001年至2003年，任中央对外宣传办公室副主任。
description.en: From 2001 to 2003, he served as Deputy Director of the Central Office for Foreign Propaganda.

description.zh-cn: 2001年至2003年，任国务院新闻办公室副主任。
description.en: From 2001 to 2003, he served as Deputy Director of the State Council Information Office.

description.zh-cn: 2001年至2003年，任中国人权研究会副会长。
description.en: From 2001 to 2003, he served as Vice President of the China Society for Human Rights Studies.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室

description.zh-cn: 2003年至2012年，任中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室副主任。
description.en: From 2003 to 2012, he served as Deputy Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室副主任期间，协助促成2012年香港政治制度改革。
description.en: During his tenure as Deputy Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, he assisted in facilitating the 2012 Hong Kong electoral reform.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室

description.zh-cn: 2012年12月19日至2014年1月9日任副主任，2014年1月9日至2016年7月任主任。
description.en: Served as Deputy Director from December 19, 2012, to January 9, 2014, and as Director from January 9, 2014, to July 2016.

description.zh-cn: 2016年7月至2017年8月22日，任国务院侨务办公室副主任（正部长级）。
description.en: From July 2016 to August 22, 2017, he served as Deputy Director (ministerial level) of the Overseas Chinese Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 国务院于2017年8月22日免去李刚的国务院侨务办公室副主任职务。
description.en: The State Council removed Li Gang from his position as Deputy Director of the Overseas Chinese Affairs Office on August 22, 2017.

relationships.source: 第十二届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌严重违纪，李刚被责令辞去第十二届全国人民代表大会代表职务，其辞职于2017年8月23日被广东省人大常委会接受，并于2017年9月1日由全国人大常委会会议确认。
description.en: Due to suspected serious violations of discipline, Li Gang was ordered to resign from his position as a deputy to the 12th National People's Congress. His resignation was accepted by the Standing Committee of the Guangdong Provincial People's Congress on August 23, 2017, and confirmed by a meeting of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress on September 1, 2017.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会第八次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 会议审议并通过了关于李刚严重违纪问题的审查报告，确认之前作出的给予李刚留党察看一年处分的决定。
description.en: The meeting reviewed and passed the examination report on Li Gang's serious disciplinary violations, confirming the previous decision to place him on probation within the Party for one year.

description.zh-cn: 刘敏是李刚的妻子。
description.en: Liu Min is Li Gang's wife.

description.zh-cn: 李刚接替白志健出任中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室主任。
description.en: Li Gang succeeded Bai Zhijian as the Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Macao Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 王志民接替李刚出任中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区联络办公室主任。
description.en: Wang Zhimin succeeded Li Gang as the Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Macao Special Administrative Region.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 在2007年中共十七大上当选为第十七届中央纪律检查委员会委员。
description.en: Elected as a member of the 17th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection at the 17th National Congress of the CPC in 2007.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 在2012年中共十八大上当选为第十八届中央纪律检查委员会委员，其违纪处分于2017年10月9日被确认。
description.en: Elected as a member of the 18th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection at the 18th National Congress of the CPC in 2012. His disciplinary punishment was confirmed on October 9, 2017.

relationships.target: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 担任第十二届全国人大代表，于2017年8月23日辞职被接受。
description.en: Served as a deputy to the 12th National People's Congress, his resignation was accepted on August 23, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 李刚是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Gang is a member of the Communist Party of China.
